mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where usercode=#{usercode}

select n.noticecode, n.usercode, n.n_title, n.content, to_char(n.n_day,'yyyy.mm.dd')as n_day, n.n_file, u.userlvl from (select rownum as rm, a.* from (select * from notice order by noticecode desc)a)n ,users u where n.rm>=#{startRow} and n.rm <= #{endRow} and u.usercode= n.usercode and userlvl=3

select c.noticecode, c.usercode,c.n_title,c.content,to_char(c.n_day,'yyyy.mm.dd') as n_day,c.n_file,( select nickname from users u where u.usercode = c.usercode) nickname from notice c where noticecode=#{noticecode}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (noticecode, usercode, n_title, content,n_day,n_file) values(NOTICE_SEQ.nextval,#{usercode},#{n_title} ,#{content},sysdate,#{n_file,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select n_file from notice where noticecode=#{noticecode}
